overview:
Anneliese Bisson is the Chief Financial Officer of Southern Cross Venture Partners. Anneliese qualified in the United Kingdom as a Chartered Accountant (ACA) with Deloitte and Touche in 1998 and since then continued her career with Deloitte, specialising in external audit in the financial services industry with an emphasis on wealth management in London, Boston and Guernsey prior to moving to Australia in 2005.

While in Boston, she sat and passed the US Certified Public Accountant (CPA) examinations. Most recently she was a Client Director with Deloitte in Sydney. Her experience includes managing audits of investment funds, hedge funds, venture capital partnerships as well as asset management companies, banks, trust companies and superannuation schemes.

Anneliese is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales.
